sen.e: In the Jinshin War in 672, He joined OAMA no Miko (Emperor Tenmu)'s force and distinguished himself in the Battle by Ashiike.

sen.e: In "Chronicles of Japan" he is mentioned as taking part in the Battle of Ashiike which took place around July 5 in west of Nara Basin.

sen.j: この会戦では大伴吹負が率いる大海人皇子側の軍と、壱伎韓国が率いる大友皇子（弘文天皇）側の軍が戦った。
sen.e: In this battle, OAMA no Miko's force led by OTOMO no Hukei clashed with OTOMO no Miko (Emperor Kobun)'s force led by IKI no Karakuni.

In this battle, the force led by OTOMO no Fukei supporting Oama no Miko fought against the force led by IKI no Karakuni supporting Otomo no Miko (Prince Otomo who has been called Emperor Kobun after the Meiji period).
sen.cmt: 用語を統一、わかりやすくします。

sen.j: 書紀によればこのとき、来目は刀を抜いて馬を走らせ、敵軍の中にまっすぐ突入した。
sen.e: According to "Chronicles of Japan", Kume pulled out his sword and rode out his horse straight into the hostile troops.

sen.j: 吹負軍の騎兵が直後に続き、そのせいで敵軍は逃げ出した。
sen.e: His cavalry followed him, and that intimidated the enemy and made them ran away.
Following him, the Fukei's cavalry rushed into the enemy's troops, then the enemy's soldiers ran away.

sen.j: 韓国は軍から離れて独り逃げた。
sen.e: Karakuni left his army and ran away.
Karakuni left his army and ran away by himself.

sen.j: 吹負はこれを遠くから見て、来目に射させた。
sen.e: Hukei saw him running in the distance and told Kume to shoot him.
From the distance Fukei saw him running away and ordered Kume to shoot him.
sen.cmt: 表記を統一、わかりやすくします。

sen.j: 来目の矢は当たらず、韓国は逃げおおせたが、敗走した軍を立て直すことはできなかった。
sen.e: Kume's arrow did not hit him and Karakuni managed to escape but he was never able to regain his force.
Since Kume's arrow missed, Karakuni managed to run away, however Karakuni could not rally his run-away soldiers.

sen.j: この戦勝で吹負は西方からの脅威を排除した。
sen.e: The victory of this battle removed the threats from west.

sen.j: 来目についての記述は他に見えない。
sen.e: There is no other description found of Kume.

sen.j: 劇的な活躍をした人物なのに名が欠けていること、戦後に来目を賞する記事が見えないことから、来目の実在を疑う学者がいる。
sen.e: There are scholar(s) who is/are sceptical of Kume's existence as he lacks his name despite the fact that he made a tremendous mark in the battle and also there is no description of his rewards afterwards.

Some scholars are skeptical of Kume's existence as the record lacks his name despite the fact that he played a dramatic part in the battle and there remain no records about commendation for him after the war.
sen.cmt: 訳漏れ、文法ミスがあります。
sen.e: Some scholars are skeptical of Kume's existence as the record lacks his name despite the fact that he played a dramatic part in the battle and there remain no records about commendation for him after the war.

sen.j: その説では、『日本書紀』編者、あるいはそれが参考にしたと想像される大伴氏の記録を作成した者が造作したという。
sen.e: In this theory, it is speculated that he was invented by the editor of "Chronicles of Japan" or the writer who created the record of OTOMO clan who used it as his reference.
